attributionInfo.brokerName: Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Kee Realty SCS
Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Kee Realty NB

data.description: Welcome to your new home! This spacious 5-bedroom gem, over 1500 sqft, features 2 fully updated bathrooms and a modern kitchen with granite countertops and subway tile. Bask in the warmth of recessed lighting in the open living and dining area. Nestled near St. Clair Shores Nautical Mile, enjoy easy access to charming restaurants and shops. Take a leisurely stroll to Lake St. Clair, and appreciate the 2-car garage and expansive backyard. As you step into the New Year, embrace the opportunity to infuse your unique style, making this inviting space the perfect home for you and your family.
